mapper.update: update fork_info set doc_id=#{docId},fork_note=#{forkNote} where fork_id=#{forkId}
mapper.select: select fork.*,doc.doc_name,file.file_name,file.*,user.user_name from user_info user,fork_info fork,doc_info doc,file_info file where fork.doc_id=doc.doc_id and user.user_id=file.file_user_id and fork.file_id=file.file_id and doc.doc_user_id=#{docUserId} order by fork.doc_id
